channel.title: How do i change text on the ::help menu
channel.description: when i log in my server (fire scape v4) it says register at firescape forums w.e i want it to say my forums and on the ::help menu it says owner:alex i want it to be Kids Ranqe can someone teach me how to change i would greatly appreciate it. thank you all who take time to help noobs like me :P

item.title: How do i change text on the ::help menu
item.dc:creator: @Anon_Ftw Anon_Ftw
item.description:
@Anon_Ftw wrote:

Open your client.java and Hold CTRL and press F.
Search for “help”.
Likely it will be something like this:
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“help”)) {
Something like that.
Around that area you will find your ::help menu. Just change the shit in there save, compile, and run.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change text on the ::help menu

item.title: How do i change text on the ::help menu
item.dc:creator: @ShIzNeT ShIzNeT
item.description:
@ShIzNeT wrote:

Open client.java and search for Player “implements Runnable” no quotes" then replace ur menu with this
or Edit sendQuest("", 8147);.

Between the “” is where you type ur message

[code]public void MainHelpMenu()
{
if(playerRights < 0){

				sendQuest("@dre@Main Menu", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();

				sendQuest("@whi@Welcome to (SERVER NAME HERE) "+playerName", 8145);
				sendQuest("@bla@~~~", 8147);

				sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @blu@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @whi@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@bla@Players online: @whi@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8150);

                                    sendQuest("@blu@===@whi@Your pk stats@blu@===", 8151);
				sendQuest("@bla@Total Kills - @whi@"+killcount, 8152);
				sendQuest("@bla@Pk Points - @whi@"+pkpoints, 8153);
				sendQuest("@bla@Death Count - @whi@"+deathcount, 8154);

sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}[/code]

Next part find “help” with quotes" and your old command with this.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) { MainHelpMenu(); }

Just edit wat u want it to say in the help menu
Enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change text on the ::help menu

item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

you make it like
the first 3 letters of the color word

e.g
@yel@
@blu@
@gre@
@red@

stuff like that b4 the word
e.g
@red@“hi how are you today”

item.title: How do i change text on the ::help menu
item.dc:creator: @funtwo funtwo
item.description:
@funtwo wrote:

l00k f0r sumthing like this

[code]public void ServerHelp()
{
if(playerRights < 4){

			sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome "+playerName, 8144);  //Title
			clearQuestInterface();
			sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome to Pirate Isle ", 8145);
			sendFrame126("@dre@If you crash and CAN'T connect, Restart Client !", 8147);
			sendFrame126("@dre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8149);[/code]

that isnt the full secti0n as u can see it hasnt been cl0sed.
y0u can pretty much see what happens
y0u type send frame126("@c0l0ur@y0ur writing here, line number); if u have the same line number everything will be 0n the same line remember t0 change it. and then 0f c0urse u cl0se with a } underneath the last line
